attributes.additional_details: This E Petition is for the UK government to repeal the London Declaration 1949. The London Declaration 1949 allows countries who are Republics to become members of the Commonwealth of Nations, and there are 38 nations who are republics in the commonwealth. There are 16 Nations that have the queen as head of state in the commonwealth and if a country is a republic, then they should not be allowed in the commonwealth.
